::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Rodimus continued to reply to his wife over the commlink.

Rodimus: We're ok out here but the city is under siege by a large Minion force...

Kup: Move. Now!

Kup grabs Rodimus and takes them both over the railing into the water below. They start to swim as Cyclonus' missile eradicate the balcony above.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               OOC: If I have forgotten anyone PLEASE let me know. Also I have to
 assume that Doc is firing at the sweeps, which btw look almost
 identical to Scourge, since Doc is some distance from Scourge and
 cannot see him from his vantage point. If that is incorrect please let
 me know and I will make changes.
 
 BIC:
 
 In the air sweeps continue to rain firepower on city below. In some
 places people are continuing to be corralled into larger building
 structures, while in other places the sweeps fire with seeming abandon.
 With a frightening intelligence a few �wings� of sweeps break off and
 begin to target the anti-aircraft batteries, disintegration beams
 cutting through skies like energized ginsue knives. 
 
 Meanwhile in the air a short distance from the maximal base
 Ravenchief�s volley of missiles flew at Cyclonus, only to be evaded by
 the craft. Boosters flared as Cyclonus swung to one side, allowing the
 missiles to fly past him. With a short burst of cannon fire he blew
 them out of the sky, and then he continued on. 
 
 However Ravenchief was not to be left without company, Scourge banked
 around also, his sweep craft uniquely agile and swift. As he came
 around a red targeting laser blared out �painting� Ravenchief, �You are
 a fool to stand against us Maximal! You only have termination to look
 forward to!� Scourge opened up with his acid cannons!
 
 On the shoreline the sweeps lost interest in searching for Trelos,
 perhaps they lost his scent, so turned their attention to Doc. 
 
 As Doc�s blast lanced out, catching one sweep in the wing casing it to
 smoke a little. Meanwhile the unmistakable smell of acid began filling
 the air as red targeting beams danced around Doc�s position and two
 other sweeps began to open fire on Doc.
 
 On the railing above Doc�s position, Kup managed to hit one of the
 sweeps but the other - either it was more agile or more lucky - but it
 managed to avoid him. Even as that happened several other sweeps swung
 into position ready to open fire as targeting beams lanced out again,
 but just suddenly they broke position! 
 
 The reason for this became more evident as the now open air rippled and
 twin missiles approached Kup and Rodimus� positions, fire and wind
 trailing behind them like a vortex. As the missiles approached it was
 obvious that they were the same type of missiles fired from Cyclonus
 earlier and that these missiles were going to do quite a bit of damage!
 
 At the Maximal base, sweeps continued to pound on it in an attempt to
 break its shield defenses!
 
 OOC: Don�t forget Nightstrike and Darkfate were commanded by Cyclonus
 to either take the Maximal base or Destroy it with the help of the
 sweeps left behind.
